features.situation: on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning

mo-ldQAGD7P2pKF9G.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

tFihC7EGFuMN3nsT8.name: Longevity
tFihC7EGFuMN3nsT8.notes: You fail aging rolls only on a 17 or 18, or only on an 18 if your modified HT is 17 or better

tvdFdt3xFtCI8KNj2.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

mkoi_TJbUGa0gyn2l.name: Diffuse
mkoi_TJbUGa0gyn2l.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mTkDsO9__aKExtAyZ.name: Homogenous
mTkDsO9__aKExtAyZ.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

msNbObaxbjh1j-dvm.name: No Blood
msNbObaxbjh1j-dvm.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mZ8DxkTLGnM8zPeJ_.name: No Brain
mZ8DxkTLGnM8zPeJ_.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mb4qyhBcBuTC0eMM9.name: No Eyes
mb4qyhBcBuTC0eMM9.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mm6qfA2tr_gJn2MOo.name: No Head
mm6qfA2tr_gJn2MOo.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mBBzTf_lykoqEQ0Ie.name: No Neck
mBBzTf_lykoqEQ0Ie.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

m9JQBESoN_gsvjEHB.name: No Vitals
m9JQBESoN_gsvjEHB.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mXTep30ewhUNZC_I8.name: Unliving
mXTep30ewhUNZC_I8.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

t62kc6hcUDFkbe_3k.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points

m2ildtkzRdTmvvNNn.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mYXYh_ClGUTvjAaGi.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

m9NHhSsH2vz7IOvvR.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

tWhY2Vh9O-rb9GoE1.name: Hidebound
tWhY2Vh9O-rb9GoE1.notes: -2 penalty on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage.

tjYsYWr8nzs52Lbbc.name: Incurious
tjYsYWr8nzs52Lbbc.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!
